p: Mordekaiser gains a powerful damage aura and movement speed after landing 3 attacks or spells against champions.
q: Mordekaiser smashes the ground with his mace dealing damage to each enemy struck. Damage is increased when hitting a single enemy.
w: Mordekaiser stores damage he deals and takes to create a shield. He may consume the shield to heal.
e: Mordekaiser pulls all enemies in an area.
r: Mordekaiser drags his victim to a different dimension with him and steals a portion of their stats. If he kills them, he keeps the stats until the victim respawns.
